transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ha Vishnu ji se baat kar rahi hu main IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha, ha, ha boliye kya karna padega usme?
Executive: Abhi main aapko guide kar de rahi hu sir, ye aapka is number pe dekhiye maine whatsapp kiya hai apne number se aapko whatsapp pe receiving hai. Ek second, ek second.
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Bhej deta hu.
Customer: Aaya hai?
Executive: Ha, to main aapko na ispe google meeting ka invitation share kar rahi hu, usko aap join kariye fir main aapko guide kar deti hu, thik hai? Ek minute rukiye main share kar rahi hu. Aapke mail pe, mail ka access hoga aapke paas? Mail pe bhi gaya, whatsapp pe bhej de rahi hu wo zyada sahi rahega.
Customer: Ha, to like isme to mera IndiaMART hai kya nahi is mobile pe?
Executive: Koi baat nahi aap isse kar lijiye, whatsapp pe bhi kar sakte hai, whatsapp pe dekhiye maine google link ka share kiya hai.
Customer: Ha, join abhi bhej raha hu.
Executive: Ek second, ek second.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aa gaya?
Customer: Ho gaya.
Executive: Haanji ho gaya.
Executive: Ab isme sir dekhiye aapke screen pe hi mobile se aapne connect kiya hai na sir?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To aapke screen pe dekhiye three bindi bani hogi, three dots, us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ha, three dots, ha.
Executive: Ha, ab usme ek icon hoga heart ke bagal mein, box bana hai aur usme arrow bana hua hai, dikh raha hai? Box hai usme arrow.
Customer: Ha, ha arrow hai.
Executive: Ha, usme likha hota hai share screen, ha.
Customer: Hmm, isme to kuch share bolke to nahi dikhta hai. 
Executive: Entire ya single app, entire screen.
Customer: Ha, entire hai aur ek share button hai.
Executive: Ha, share kar dijiye. Abhi share, share karu kya?
Customer: Ha, usse aapki screen dikhegi to main aapke screen pe bataungi kaise karna hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab IndiaMART app open kariye, back kariye isko.
Customer: Isme off nahi, app nahi hai mam.
Executive: IndiaMART isme nahi hai?
Customer: To aap IndiaMART pehle, koi baat nahi, aapke IndiaMART hai. Ha, please bhi kar raha hu.
Executive: Allow kariye.
Customer: Actually, actually main, main bata rahi hu kaise karna hai, ye dekhiye sabse upar dekhiye likha hua hai bell icon ke bagal mein sell now, sell now pe click kariye.
Executive: Sabse upar.
Customer: Ye actually, ha sahi pehle misclick aa gaya, continue.
Executive: Abhi ye no kar dijiye, no, ha, ha back kariye, ha, back.
Customer: Thik hai, next.
Customer: Actually kaunsa hai? Ye mera screen nahi hai.
Executive: Aapka access nahi hai kya?
Customer: Dusra, ek minute rukiye main bata rahi hu. Sabse upar dekhiye three lines jaha hai na isko cross pe click kariye, sabse, ha, three lines pe click kariye sabse upar, ha.
Executive: Ye actually hamara dusra number hai, ye actually wo nahi hai, log out karna padega.
Customer: Ha, ha, chalega, sabse niche setting pe aake log out kariye, sabse niche setting, setting pe click kariye, ha, sabse upar right side mein three dots pe click kariye, sabse upar.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ha, log out.
Customer: Ek kaam kijiye na aap, mere system wala mein kariye na usme better rahega, usme link bhej dijiye, uska mobile mein sab kuch hai.
Executive: Nahi number sir aapka hai isiliye main aapke number se kar rahi hu, aap hi ka main number laga hua hai.
Customer: Achha, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Ha, aap apna number lagaiye jo 89 wala hai, last mein 919 hai usi se login hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai, next kariye.
Customer: Number sahi?
Executive: Yes aa gaya.
Executive: OTP, ha OTP laga dijiye.
Customer: OTP aayega na, ek second.
Executive: Ji ji aaram se kariye koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Zero, eight, nine, eight, nine.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Ek second, mistake ho gaya.
Customer: Are yaar, sab gadbad ho gaya.
Executive: Fir se kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Eight, nine, eight, nine.
Executive: Hmm, ho gaya.
Customer: Ho gaya abhi, remind me later.
Executive: Ha, ab isme sabse upar high Vishnu ji likha hai na three lines pe us pe click kariye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab isme sir aapko number add karna hai na ek, jispe call aa raha hai, aap ye kariye.
Customer: Ha ha, aap ye kariye.
Executive: Thik hai, to sabse niche setting pe click kariye sir, sabse niche jaha setting likha hua hai, sabse niche.
Customer: Setting, ha setting, ha.
Executive: Ab isme ye PNS setting likha hai na preferred number, us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ha, ha, add number.
Executive: Ha, add number.
Executive: Thik hai, ab jo number aapko add karna hai wo number lagaiyega.
Customer: Hmm, bhai dekhto Narayan ka number kitna hai?
Customer: Isme to ghum raha hai abhi.
Executive: Achha, net slow hoga.
Customer: Number likh lega.
Executive: Thik hai abhi net aapka slow chal raha hai iski wajah se ho raha hai.
Customer: Nahi wifi chal raha hai mera, aisa to nahi hona chahiye.
Executive: Dekhiye main ek kaam karti hu ye call yaha se cut kar de rahi hu, direct yaha se baat karenge to zyada sahi rahega.
Customer: Ha ha, ha ha.
Executive: Ab lekin sir ye jo google meeting chal raha hai na usme click kariye, waha pe ek mic ka option diya hua hai. Ye jo google meeting chal raha hai isme aaiye, mic dekhiye bana hua hai side mein, right side mein, ha mic pe click kariye.
Customer: Are isko jara, ha right side mein mic, left mein yaha pe to left mein dikh raha hai.
Customer: Side mein.
Executive: Sabse niche, ha.
Customer: Niche nahi, niche video call hai, hold button hai.
Executive: Ek minute main call cut kar dungi tab shayad aayega, aapka ye sabse niche jo dikh raha hai na left mein ye pehle camera hai fir mic hai, mic aap on kariye ga, main call cut kar de rahi hu tab aayega, thik hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance adding a number.



Resolution:

- Executive shared Google Meet link for guidance.

- Executive guided customer to add number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will cut the call and reconnect.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- add number, google meet, screen sharing, pns setting
